name: Scheduled Posts Publisher
author: Bayu Prahasto

sections.description: When a visitor loads your site or you access your posts/pages admin page, this plugin checks and publishes them immediately if any scheduled posts have been missed.
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins, Add New, Upload Plugin.
  2. Upload the ZIP file.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

NOTE: Make sure that your timezone is set correctly in Settings->General.
sections.faq:
How often does it check missed posts?

Every time someone or you loads your home page or a single post/article or admin posts page.

Iâ€™ve activated the plugin-and the posts are not publishing

Make sure you set the timezone correctly. Make sure there are no plugin conflicts by deactive your other plugins, one by one. Especially caching plugins.

short_description: This plugin will checks and if any scheduled posts have been missed, it publishes them.
description: When a visitor loads your site or you access your posts/pages admin page, this plugin checks and publishes them immediately if any scheduled posts have been missed.
